t: Amazon Opening 4-Star Stores Is All About Amazon Prime - Business Insider
s: October 10, 2018 - The store, called Amazon 4-Star, stocks only items that customers have rated four stars or above, on average, on Amazon's website. That means it will include only the best of the best, in the eyes of Amazon's customers. It opened in Manhattan's SoHo neighborhood on September 27, and another ...

t: Amazon Tries To Find A Home For Its Private Label Products With New '4-Star' Store
s: September 28, 2018 - Amazon opened its first “4 Star Store” in New York City, a new retail concept that brings products that are trending on Amazon into a real life store. Amazon says the store is a place where its customers can discover products - including their own growing array of private label products.

t: The New Amazon 4-Star Store Needs To Change
s: October 12, 2018 - The new Amazon 4-star store has a great idea: show consumers what products are popular. But that's not all it takes to have a successful store. Amazon 4-star needs to be much better in order to succeed.
